name: part_002
file: tmp_Yozora Mel stream (Oct 31, 2022)【ホロライブ ⧸ 3DLIVE】ハロウィンのお姫様  Halloween Princess 【#夜空メル爆誕2022】 [WbNkG3kbOHo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: MC section where Yozora Mel talks to guest speakers and then introduces herself to the audience.

subtitles.original: なんか帰る感じ？
subtitles.english: Are we leaving?

subtitles.original: いや今日ね、ハロウィンだから魔界の通りたちは、お菓子いっぱいもらいに行かないといけないんですよ。
subtitles.english: Well today is Halloween, so the Underworld residents have to go get lots of treats.

subtitles.original: え？ちょっと待って、ずっと魔界にいたからさ、めちゃめちゃしてたチョコ、お腹空いた。
subtitles.english: Wait a sec, we've been in the Underworld this whole time, my stomach is growling for chocolate.

subtitles.original: ああ分かる、メルもお腹空いた。
subtitles.english: Ah, I get it. Mel's hungry too.

subtitles.original: 食べに行っちゃう？食べに行っちゃう？
subtitles.english: Shall we go eat? Shall we go eat?

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って！メルも行きたい！
subtitles.english: Wait a minute! Mel wants to go too!

subtitles.original: ねえ、ずるい！メルも！
subtitles.english: Hey, that's unfair! Mel too!

subtitles.original: 待って待って待って！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, wait!

subtitles.original: 行かないで！
subtitles.english: Don't go!

subtitles.original: 置いていかないで、待ってー！
subtitles.english: Don't leave me behind, wait!

subtitles.original: 頑張ってねー！
subtitles.english: Good luck!

subtitles.original: 行っちゃったよ。頑張ってねって。
subtitles.english: They just left... saying "Good luck."

subtitles.original: えー、本当に、もう寂しいじゃん。
subtitles.english: Eh... it's really lonely now.

subtitles.original: あ、でも今日はね、かぷみんのみんながいるよね。
subtitles.english: Ah, but today, all the Kapumin are here, right?

subtitles.original: よし！改めてみんな...
subtitles.english: Alright! Once again, everyone...

subtitles.original: こんかぷー！魔界の天才バンパイア、夜空メルでーす！
subtitles.english: Konkapu! The Underworld's genius vampire, Yozora Mel!

subtitles.original: 今日は最後まで楽しんでいってください。
subtitles.english: Please enjoy until the end today.

subtitles.original: そしてそして、#夜空メル爆誕2022 でいっぱいツイートしてね。
subtitles.english: And, and, tweet a lot with #YozoraMelBirthday2022!

subtitles.original: 写真もバシャバシャ撮ってください。
subtitles.english: Please take lots of photos too.

subtitles.original: 後でメル見に行くからな。約束だよ。
subtitles.english: Mel will check them out later. It's a promise!

subtitles.original: この後もまだまだコラボとかソロ曲とかたくさん続くので、ぜひぜひ最後まで楽しんでいってください。
subtitles.english: After this, there are still many collabs and solo songs to come, so please, please enjoy until the very end.

subtitles.original: よし！それじゃあ、この後も一緒に楽しんでいくぞー！
subtitles.english: Alright! Well then, let's continue to enjoy the rest together! Let's go!

subtitles.original:
Feuer! Sperrfeuer! Los!
Achtung! Deckung! Hinlegen! Halt!
subtitles.english:
Fire! Barrage! Go!
Attention! Cover! Lie down! Halt!

subtitles.original:
Feuer! Sperrfeuer! Los!
Achtung! Deckung! Hinlegen! Halt!
subtitles.english:
Fire! Barrage! Go!
Attention! Cover! Lie down! Halt!

subtitles.original:
戦場へ 前世へ そして死の淵まで
命捨てたその覚悟を示せ
subtitles.english:
To the battlefield, to the front line, and even to the brink of death.
Show the resolution of one who has cast aside their life.

subtitles.original:
震えるだろう あの砲声が
抵抗もする うちの声だ
subtitles.english:
You must be trembling, that roar of cannon fire.
It's our voice of resistance.

subtitles.original: 踏み潰せ 踏み潰せ
subtitles.english: Crush them! Crush them!

subtitles.original:
諸君、我々の任務は何だ？殲滅だ！
生き残り残らずの殲滅だ！
subtitles.english:
Soldiers, what is our mission? Annihilation!
Complete annihilation with no survivors!

subtitles.original: 為すべき事はただ一つ 地獄を創れ！
subtitles.english: There is only one thing to do. Create hell!

subtitles.original:
弾丸の雨に打たれに行くのか
笑止千万 帝国の為だ！
subtitles.english:
Are you going to be struck by the rain of bullets?
How ridiculous, it's for the Empire!

subtitles.original:
戦場へ 前世へ そして死の淵まで
命捨てた覚悟を示せよ
subtitles.english:
To the battlefield, to the front line, and even to the brink of death.
Show the resolution of one who has cast aside their life.

subtitles.original:
忠誠を 純情を そしてその魂を
全て捧げ勝ち鬨を上げよ
subtitles.english:
Loyalty, devotion, and even your very soul.
Sacrifice everything and raise a cry of victory.

subtitles.original:
さあ其処に築いてみせろ
天に届く死体の山を
subtitles.english:
Now, build it there.
A mountain of corpses reaching to the heavens.

subtitles.original:
Feuer! Sperrfeuer! Los!
Achtung! Deckung! Hinlegen! Halt!
subtitles.english:
Fire! Barrage! Go!
Attention! Cover! Lie down! Halt!

subtitles.original:
どこに興味があると言うんだ
見ろ死肉が花火のようだ
subtitles.english:
Where do you think your interest lies?
Look, the dead flesh is like fireworks.

subtitles.original: 撒き散らす 撒き散らす
subtitles.english: Scatter it! Scatter it!

subtitles.original:
千の傷跡忘れちゃいないさ
炎の熱も零れた脳（おもい）も
subtitles.english:
I'll never forget the thousand scars.
Not the heat of the flames, nor the spilled brains.

subtitles.original:
最期の呻きも濁った瞳も
嗚呼それこそを求めるのだ
subtitles.english:
Not the final groans, nor the clouded eyes.
Ah, that is exactly what we seek.

subtitles.original:
憐れも屁も まして我が灼く
敵は牙を捨てた飼い犬の所業
subtitles.english:
Pity and farts, let alone my scorching.
The enemy's deeds are those of a pet dog that threw away its fangs.

subtitles.original:
絶望と動乱を懸けた正気の沙汰は
地獄よりも楽園のようだ
subtitles.english:
An act of sanity bet on despair and upheaval
is like a paradise more than hell.

subtitles.original:
その四肢は踊る為に
踊り狂う為有るのだ！
subtitles.english:
Those limbs exist for dancing.
They exist for dancing madly!

subtitles.original:
見える価値など無い 価値なき者同士の争いに
命の徒花咲かせてみせろ
subtitles.english:
There is no visible value. In a conflict between worthless things,
make the ephemeral flowers of life bloom.

subtitles.original:
法律も秩序でも
狂った奴が創ってる
subtitles.english:
Laws and order alike
are made by madmen.

subtitles.original:
まさに笑劇不条理だけの
起承転結
subtitles.english:
Truly a farce, an introduction-development-twist-conclusion
of nothing but absurdity.

subtitles.original:
戦場へ 前世へ そして死の淵まで
命捨てた覚悟を示せ
subtitles.english:
To the battlefield, to the front line, and even to the brink of death.
Show the resolution of one who has cast aside their life.

subtitles.original:
忠誠を 純情を そしてその魂を
全て捧げ勝ち鬨を上げよ
subtitles.english:
Loyalty, devotion, and even your very soul.
Sacrifice everything and raise a cry of victory.

subtitles.original:
さあ其処に築いてみせろ
天に届く死体の山に
subtitles.english:
Now, build it there.
Into a mountain of corpses reaching to the heavens.

subtitles.original:
谺す憎しみさえ
掻き消す爆発を
subtitles.english:
An explosion that drowns out
even the echoing hatred.

subtitles.original: Feuer! Sperrfeuer! Los!
subtitles.english: Fire! Barrage! Go!
